articles.title: Here's how you can get the Moto G Stylus and G Power for free this Black Friday - PhoneArena
articles.description: The always affordable Moto G Stylus and G Power mid-rangers are essentially available for free from Google Fi this holiday season for both new and existing customers.

articles.title: Hands-on: Google Assistant works better on Fitbit than most Wear OS watches - 9to5Google
articles.description: Google Assistant has just arrived on the latest Fitbit smartwatches, but despite the barebones hardware, it runs better than on Google's own Wear OS.
